experience.title: Data Scientist

positions.subtitle: Spring Fest
positions.description: ‚Ä¢ Created and maintained Nation Wise Prelims Website for allowing participants to register themselves in the prelims across their city.‚Ä¢ Conducted Freshers event by maintaining an online Portal for leaderboard scores and Load balancing across several events using Web Sockets and CSS framework.‚Ä¢ Created Mobile Website for Spring Fest, which has an interactive theme based on Gyroscope and Accelerometer of the device using Parallax.js and AngularJS ‚Ä¢ Developed Fest Portal, an initiative to manage all activities of fest, using core PHP and JavaScript, formulated in MVC Format

projects: [{"title":"Chhuk Chhuk ( Web Application / Messenger Chat Bot)","start_date":"Nov 2016","description":"+ Web Application Based, Facebook Messenger Chatbot+ Designed on AI/ Machine Learning Background, to solve the queries regarding Railway Travels/ Booking+Secured Best Project in Microsoft's Online Code.Fun.Do (Application Development Hackathon) and Secured 3rd Position in the On Campus Code.Fun.Do. (Senior League), IIT KHARAGPUR+ Features Include:* All Basic Railway Enqueries like PNR, Live Status, Full Routes, etc. * Language Flexibility by Accepting Queries in local languages like Hindi, to support the major population of the country* Voice Input Enabled allowing user to enter his query, without typing a single word, by just communicating with the both with his voice"},{},{}]
